Docs.summary: Gets a nullable Boolean value that tells whether the bindable object is available to the accessibility system.
Docs.returns: if is available to the accessibility system. or if it is not.
Docs.remarks: Developers use to set this attached property to in order to make the bindable object available to the accessibility system.
